caption.center: HUBERT EARL STEVENS, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Gulf County. Judy M. Pittman, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Nancy A. Daniels, Public Defender, and Jamie Spivey, Assistant Public Defender, Tallahassee, for Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BROWNING, C.J., KAHN and ROBERTS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED
